name: The Captives: Plot of the Demiurge
description: The Captives: Plot of the Demiurge is an action-adventure game with real-time combat. Play as ten different characters of your creation. At the end of playing as one character they become an NPC! Assemble your own collection of prisoners and work together to defeat the evil schemes of Prince Pico.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i5-3450 @ 3.10 GHz (4 CPUs) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition On-board Audio
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64-bit Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
